summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in Header.tsx by removing the visible "MyGallery" text (no app-name text present in the top-left header area near the icon). However, the diff also includes modifications to non-requested project/summary files, which conflicts with the constraint to not change anything else besides removing the header text.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/metadata file (project_state.json) despite requirement to only remove the header text and not change anything else.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest restricts changes to removing the visible "MyGallery" header text only; updating project_state.json is not part of REQ-1 and is not necessary to remove the UI text.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (documentation/summary content) despite requirement to only remove the header text.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify no other changes besides removing the "MyGallery" header text; updating a summaries file is not requested by REQ-1.
